title: Does Brewster have a sign of "all holidays is a matter '?
subtitle: A photo that claims to show two men with signs - one reading "We must stop the war at Christmas" and another saying "All holidays are important" - is a trick.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photo showing a protestor with a sign saying "We must stop the war at Christmas" next to another man with a sign reading "All the holiday issue."
